thread.title: People Are Screaming After A Confused Grandma Actually Prayed For Nicki Minaj At Church - BuzzFeed News

author: Tanya Chen
title: People Are Screaming After A Confused Grandma Actually Prayed For Nicki Minaj At Church - BuzzFeed News
text:
Raven also said she’ll talk to grandma Johnnie soon about the mix-up, and will update us about how that conversation goes. “But I absolutely will not let her listen to the [Remy Ma] song,” she said.
